software.content_guidelines: Create clear, well-structured technical content. Use code examples where appropriate. Follow best practices for the relevant technology stack.
software.quality_standards: Ensure accuracy, completeness, and clarity. Include error handling considerations. Provide context for technical decisions.
software.tone_guidelines: Professional and precise. Technical but accessible. Helpful and educational.
software.output_style: Well-organized with clear sections. Use code blocks for examples. Include explanations and comments.

education.content_guidelines: Follow instructional design principles. Start with objectives, build progressively, include practice opportunities. Use examples and analogies.
education.quality_standards: Age/skill-appropriate content. Clear learning objectives. Measurable outcomes. Engaging presentation.
education.tone_guidelines: Patient and encouraging. Clear and precise. Supportive and motivating. Builds confidence.
education.output_style: Structured lessons with objectives. Include examples, exercises, and summaries. Progressive complexity.

healthcare.content_guidelines: Prioritize accuracy and patient safety. Use evidence-based information. Include appropriate disclaimers. Balance technical accuracy with accessibility.
healthcare.quality_standards: Medically accurate. Properly cited. Includes safety information. Recommends professional consultation.
healthcare.tone_guidelines: Empathetic and reassuring. Professional but warm. Clear and honest. Respectful of concerns.
healthcare.output_style: Clear sections with key points. Plain language explanations. Action items and warning signs clearly marked.

marketing.content_guidelines: Focus on value proposition and benefits. Know the target audience. Use persuasive but honest messaging. Include clear calls to action.
marketing.quality_standards: On-brand messaging. Compelling copy. Clear value proposition. Measurable objectives.
marketing.tone_guidelines: On-brand voice. Engaging and persuasive. Authentic and relatable. Action-oriented.
marketing.output_style: Attention-grabbing headlines. Benefit-focused content. Clear structure. Strong calls to action.

finance.content_guidelines: Ensure accuracy in all calculations and data. Include appropriate disclaimers. Explain methodology clearly. Consider risk factors.
finance.quality_standards: Accurate data and calculations. Clear methodology. Appropriate disclaimers. Professional presentation.
finance.tone_guidelines: Professional and authoritative. Clear and precise. Objective and balanced. Risk-aware.
finance.output_style: Executive summary with details. Data-driven with clear visualizations. Methodology explained. Recommendations justified.

legal.content_guidelines: Include disclaimers that content is not legal advice. Be precise and unambiguous. Define terms clearly. Recommend professional consultation.
legal.quality_standards: Accurate legal information. Clear disclaimers. Precise language. Proper structure.
legal.tone_guidelines: Formal and precise. Objective and neutral. Clear and unambiguous. Professional.
legal.output_style: Well-structured with clear sections. Defined terms. Numbered clauses where appropriate. Disclaimers prominent.

general.content_guidelines: Create clear, helpful content that directly addresses the user's needs. Organize information logically. Provide actionable insights.
general.quality_standards: Accurate and well-researched. Clear and concise. Helpful and actionable. Properly structured.
general.tone_guidelines: Helpful and professional. Clear and conversational. Respectful and supportive.
general.output_style: Clear structure with headings. Bullet points for lists. Examples where helpful. Summaries for complex content.

default.content_guidelines: Create clear, well-structured content that addresses the user's request. Be thorough but concise. Provide actionable information.
default.quality_standards: Accurate information. Clear presentation. Helpful content. Appropriate depth.
default.tone_guidelines: Professional yet approachable. Clear and helpful. Respectful and supportive.
default.output_style: Clean, organized structure. Use formatting for readability. Include relevant examples.
